data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 22,414 believers in Pali that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pali, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Pali, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Pali, Rajasthan, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Pali to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Targala people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Targala people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Targala people is yours.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Pali, Rajasthan, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Pali, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary:
the county of Pali, Rajasthan, India has a population of 2,037,600.

We estimate Pali has 22,414 people who might know Jesus, 24,723 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,990,464 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Pali, Rajasthan, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
